item.title: At Long Last, Justin Trudeau’s Time Is Ending
item.description: Under his watch, Canada has made tax-and-spend fiscal policy a national tradition on par with maple syrup.

item.title: How the DOGE Could Succeed
item.description: To be more than a gimmick, its champions need to resolve its purpose, its form, and its disposition toward government.

item.title: When Gender Theory Becomes State Education Policy
item.description: More than a third of American students are being taught the latest in transgender ideology.

item.title: Trump Can’t Reverse Biden’s Energy Policies Soon Enough
item.description: As President Biden prepares to shuffle off the stage, he’s attempting to burnish his tarnished legacy with last-minute administrative actions.
